text: King Si of Zhou (), personal name Ji Shu, was the 30th king of the Chinese Zhou Dynasty and the 18th of Eastern Zhou. He gained the throne in 441 by killing his older brother King Ai of Zhou, but he was himself killed by his younger brother King Kao of Zhou after only five months of rule.Family tree of Chinese kings ==Ancestry== ==See also== #Family tree of ancient Chinese emperors ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:441 BC deaths Category:Zhou dynasty kings Category:5th-century BC Chinese monarchs Category:5th-century BC murdered monarchs Category:Assassinated Chinese politicians
title: King Si of Zhou
